ygData.subject: RE: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: they used to a couple months ago.  it was common practice for me to be playing psalm of mystic shielding to avoid getting charmed, cause those shaman charmed
ygData.messageBody:
they used to a couple months ago. it was common practice for me to be
playing psalm of mystic shielding to avoid getting charmed, cause those
shaman charmed like crazy. now only the noble charms.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 20 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chris [mailto:spc@...]
> Sent: Saturday, September 18, 1999 12:10 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clerics
>
>
> From: "Chris" <spc@...>
>
> Shamans dont charm in Sol B, The Kobold Noble will though.
> I've had him 3 of 6 in a party, thank god for pumice.
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 6:58 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clerics
>
>
> > From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> >
> > Never been charmed but as a matter of fact I have gone
> there with a bunch of
> > people level 34-37. Had no problem with dealing the kobolds
> just have to be
> > careful how you pull.
> >
> > Naeeldar
> >
